point.description: Type of DER device. Default value is 4 to indicate PV device.
point.label: DERTyp

point.description: Continuous power output capability of the inverter.
point.label: WRtg

point.description: Scale factor
point.label: WRtg_SF

point.description: Continuous Volt-Ampere capability of the inverter.
point.label: VARtg

point.description: Scale factor
point.label: VARtg_SF

point.description: Continuous VAR capability of the inverter in quadrant 1.
point.label: VArRtgQ1

point.description: Continuous VAR capability of the inverter in quadrant 2.
point.label: VArRtgQ2

point.description: Continuous VAR capability of the inverter in quadrant 3.
point.label: VArRtgQ3

point.description: Continuous VAR capability of the inverter in quadrant 4.
point.label: VArRtgQ4

point.description: Scale factor
point.label: VArRtg_SF

point.notes: Sum of all connected phases.  Current rating under nominal voltage under nominal power factor.
point.description: Maximum RMS AC current level capability of the inverter.
point.label: ARtg

point.description: Scale factor
point.label: ARtg_SF

point.description: Minimum power factor capability of the inverter in quadrant 1.
point.label: PFRtgQ1

point.description: Minimum power factor capability of the inverter in quadrant 2.

point.description: Nominal energy rating of storage device.
point.label: WHRtg

point.description: Scale factor
point.label: WHRtg_SF

point.description: The usable capacity of the battery.  Maximum charge minus minimum charge from a technology capability perspective (Amp-hour capacity rating).
point.label: AhrRtg

point.description: Scale factor for amp-hour rating.
point.label: AhrRtg_SF

point.description: Maximum rate of energy transfer into the storage device.

point.description: Scale factor

point.description: Maximum rate of energy transfer out of the storage device.
